Changelog

supreme 0.2.1

  • Make the exported variables in R/globals.R options placed in R/zzz.R.

supreme 0.2.0 (2019-08-07)

  • Create example functions in the API for demonstration purposes, e.g. example_app_path().

  • Use nomnoml package for the graph() facility.

  • Implement reading functions for files (src_file()), packages (src_pkg()), environments (src_env()), expressions (src_expr()) and YAML objects (src_yaml()).

supreme 0.1.0 (2019-02-06)

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.

  • Package creation and initial work.
